titleStmt.title: Bed. ss. Ad general. session. pacis domi. regis tent. apud ampthill in & pro comitatu predict. decino quarto die Januarii anno regni domini nostri caroli secundi dei gratia Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ regis, fidei defensor. &c. tricessimo sexto, annoq; dom. 1684 at which time was present, the right honourable Robert Earl of Ailesbury, custos rotulorum of the county aforesaid.
